title: All About Orcas
description: Known as the "wolves of the sea," orcas are beautiful and powerful animals with a reputation for being excellent hunters. All About Orcas provides students an introduction to these ocean creatures through repetitive text and striking photographs. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine an author's purpose for writing and the proper use of antonyms.
meta: breathe, dolphins, hunters, mammals, orcas, packs

Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /i/ sound
